I'm not sure if I'm good at keeping up with my family, but I love them and I try to make time for them whenever I can.
I am an only child and I am excited to start a new chapter in my life at college.
under a pen name , i write romance books.

content.text: Hi!
Hello!
I'm excited to start college this fall. Are you excited about it?
Yes, I'm really excited! I'm a bit nervous, but mostly excited!
I'm sure you'll do great! What are you studying?
I'm majoring in business administration. What about you?
I'm majoring in English. I want to be a writer.
That's awesome! I love to read. Do you have any published works?
I've published a few short stories, but I'm working on my first novel now.
That's great! I'm sure it's going to be amazing.
Thanks! I hope so!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, write, and spend time with my friends and family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to go to yoga, spend time with my pets, and drink milk to help me digest my large meals.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been to yoga, but I've heard good things about it.
It's really great for your flexibility and overall health.
I'll have to try it sometime!
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Thanks! It sounds like we have a lot in common. I'm excited to get to know you better!
Me too
